Package com.example.blog.dao

Class PostDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.example.blog.dao.PostDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PostDAO
public class PostDAOImpl extends Object implements PostDAO
This interface implements all the interactions between the web application and database involving blog posts.
